level.text: Failure to comply with the affirmative action requirements stated in D.C. Official Code ยง 34-1241 (2001) shall constitute an unlawful discriminatory practice and subject the franchisee to fines imposed by the Commission on Human Rights of not less than one thousand ($1,000) dollars per day that violations persist and any other penalties that may be imposed pursuant to District of Columbia Television Communications Act of 1981 or any other law.
